trobles.h2: Did you know that 60% of issues in couples go unspoken?
trobles.h3: So can happy relationships be built at all?
trobles.secondaryTextH3: Yes, and we suggest you a tool to track your relationship journey!

columns.title: Tests and quizes

text: Over 20 features to address specific issues in your relationship
Begin conversing with your partner in the same language
Access to expert materials on relationship psychology
Joyful way to improve your relationship
Individual assessment of relationships without visiting a psychologist

faq.title: How does Tiddle maintain user confidentiality and data security?
faq.description: The Tiddle application ensures a high level of confidentiality and security. We prioritize the privacy of our users and employ robust measures to safeguard your personal information. All data transmission and storage adhere to industry-standard encryption protocols, ensuring that your information remains secure and confidential.

features.title: AI conflict mediator
features.description: The conflict mediator acts as a neutral side to the quarrel, helping the partners to talk it out, restore dialogue and emotional connection, as well as identify the roots of¬†the conflict and reconcile.

features.title: Quizzes, tests and games
features.description: Discover the strengths and weaknesses of your relationships and get to know yourself better with our exciting activities. Choose an activity topic you are interested in, for example, ‚Äúsex‚Äù, ‚Äúfinance‚Äù, ‚Äúholidays‚Äù.

features.title: Tasks and desires

features.title: Mood tracker
features.description: Keep a diary throughout the day to visualize changes in your and your partner‚Äôs emotions over any period. Show the status and reason for the change in mood. Stay in sync with your partner!
